vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.31;
son of: Malchiel (H4439)
§ Birzavith or Birzath = "in leanness: choice olive"
a descendant of Asher
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比撒威
1) 一名亞設的後裔 (代上7:31)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比撒威
1) 一名亚设的后裔 (代上7:31)
